C

Cell - Class in <Unnamed>
The Cell class is an extension of JPanel as every Cell is it's own JPanel.
Cell(int, int) - Constructor for class Cell
Constructor sets each cell at their default state (dead) with a flag count of 0.
Cell.MouseHandler - Class in <Unnamed>
MouseHandler which extends mouse adapter.
cellAlive - Variable in class Cell
boolean returns true if the cell is "alive" (yellow) or false if the cell is "dead" (light gray)
CellChecker - Class in <Unnamed>
The CellChecker class holds various static methods used in detecting cells that should be changed during for the next generation and sequentially applying those changes to the Cell objects.
CellChecker() - Constructor for class CellChecker
 
cellCount - Variable in class PlayingBoard
Value used to set the amount of cells on the board.
cells - Variable in class PlayingBoard
2D array of Cell objects
checkForTriggerEvent() - Method in class Cell.MouseHandler
 
checkNeighbors(int, Cell[][]) - Static method in class CellChecker
The method checkNeighbors runs through every Cell object and flags any cells "touching" an alive cell.
clearBoard(int, Cell[][]) - Static method in class CellChecker
The clearBoard method is called when the stopSim button is fired.
clearBoard - Variable in class PlayingBoard
Button used to clear the board and reset all cellflags
convertFlagsToLife() - Method in class Cell
Converts a cells flag value to either kill or bring this cell to life.
createBoard() - Method in class PlayingBoard
This method creates three JPanels gameGrid, buttonPanel, and gamePanel.
createGliderGun(int, Cell[][]) - Static method in class CellChecker
calls the aliveCell() method for the necessary Cell objects in order to create a Gosper's Glider Gun seed.
